text:
ARNAB CHAKRABORTY                        DATA ANALYST(3 years Exp.)
 Contact Number : 8861683595                                          Key Skills: Experience in SQL, Tableau, 
 E-mail : arnab2592@gmail.com                                            R,Excel & Machine learning
 DOB : 25/10/1992
 
Career Objective
 To work in a challenging environment which can extract the best out of me, is conducive to learning and growth at a professional level, directing all my future endeavors to be an asset to the organization. 

Software Skills

· Working on Text Analytics using R programming language.
· Experienced in prediction model, descriptive analysis, exploratory data analysis, cluster analysis.

· Experienced in writing SQL query.
· Experienced in creating complex data visualization in Tableau on different data sources (RDBMS and flat file).
· Experienced in EXCEL.

· Knowledge in Statistics. 
· Knowledge on Hadoop cluster.

· Knowledge in HDFS, PIG, HIVE.

Work Experience
	Organization
	Myntra-Jabong India Private Limited

	Designation
	Associate Data Analyst

	Duration
	From 10th Dec 2018 to Till Date

	About Area of works / Projects worked in 
	Role – Data Analyst
Description -  

· Working on supply chain management system. 
· Man Power Movement planning in different departments.
· Finding Root cause analysis for each non complaint steps.
· Data extraction and manipulation of huge volume of data and simplifying it R for better understanding.
· Maintaining and tracking product flow from inventory to logistics and inward to inventory.
·  Connecting multiple mysql servers, consolidating data and automating manual report using R language.

· Implementing tableau to visualize and understand data more clearly.
· Working with different stake holder, identify and analyse their report.


	Organization
	CERNER HEALTHCARE SOLUTIONS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

	Designation
	System Engineer

	Duration
	From 28th AUGUST  2017 to 7th Dec 2018

	About Area of works / Projects worked in 
	Role – Data Analyst
 Description -  

· Working on different machine learning project (text analytics/text classification)
· Text classification model (semi supervised) to predict change request for becoming a obligated Change request or not depending on two text based columns.

· Cluster analysis(unsupervised) on incident, change request data to identify the most common issue type in the domain.

· Utilizing regression model (supervised) on various dataset to identify the missing value.
· Creating data visualization on live data through R programming from different RDBMS sources.
· Writing complex SQL query to fetch the data through Tableau.
· Visualizing data using Tableau for better understanding and to make it interactive. Create dashboards using Tableau Dashboard and representing the proper cleaned data from the database.
                       -      Develop Scorecard from different perspective like performance                      
analysis of associate (Monthly, quarterly), analyse on types of issues with respect to different domain in Organization
· Derive the performance scales of employees on issues and help in finding most often issues.

· Prepare and present the reports with charts to highlight the important analysis point.
· Connect to JIRA database from Tableau and fetch the data to create time duration chart for each JIRAs, assigned to respective associate.
· Creating interesting informative chart on Tableau like, Bump chart, Donut chart, Pareto chart ,water fall chart and so on.

· Automating of repetitive tasks.


	Organization
	IBM INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

	Designation
	Technical Specialist

	 Role – Data Analyst
Description -  

· Utilize and analyse on Extracted data from different data source and different team.
· Extracted, compiled and tracked data, and analysed data to generate reports.

· Using histograms, running records, process behaviour charts and different chart to analyse business 

· Data Coordination with client for updates and troubleshooting.

· Coordination with team for better efficiency.

· Analysing System log through pig script.

· Analyse the efficiency of process and depending on that automated the manual process.

· Identify and analysis the reports and help manager to identify to most often issues.
